Detailed Description

Buffered Logger class. Provides logging facilities for reporting to screen, email, file. This is an implicit singleton class and is specifically written for this application.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 13 of file TestLogger.class.php.

Member Function Documentation

static TestLogger.log ( $  sMessage = '',
$  bImplicitScreenWrites = true 
) [static]

Log message (with HTML markup) to buffer and optionally to screen.

Parameters:
$sMessage string The message to log.
$bImplicitScreenWrites bool True if message should be written to screen directly.
